snippet.title: REMASTERED World at War Zombies Mod - General Changes
snippet.description:
In this part, I go over the fundamental base changes to the gamemode. This "remastered patch" is available for all four stock zombie maps (Nacht der Untoten, Verrückt, Shi No Numa, Der Riese) and aims to mod in bug fixes, quality-of-life tweaks, cut content, new features, and other improvements.
---------------------------------
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/qs2yN8JBwe
Twitter: https://x.com/john_b4nana
Mod download: https://www.ugx-mods.com/forum/mods-releases/61/t4m-nazi-zombies-remastered-der-riese-release/23262/
---------------------------------
Quick note, at 3:30 I actually circled the wrong one, the special Nacht crawler is very similar but it's slightly different. Everything I said is still accurate though.

0:00 Intro
0:31 Zombies - Miscellaneous
1:44 Zombies - Appearance & Animations
7:05 Players
9:37 Barriers

The project is also open-source on GitHub:
https://github.com/JBShady/COD5-Remastered
